me.kiip.api
Class Kiip

java.lang.Object
  me.kiip.api.Kiip

public final class Kiip
extends Object

Shared entry point to initializing Kiip, communicating with Kiip servers and accessing it's shared state. Application Class 

 @Override
 public void onCreate() {
     super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);

     Kiip.init(this, "_my_app_key_", "_my_app_secret_");
     ...
 }
Activity Classes 
 @Override
 public void onStart() {
     super.onStart();

     Kiip.getInstance().startSession(this, null);
     ...
 }

 @Override
 public void onStop() {
     super.onStop();

     Kiip.getInstance().endSession(this, null);
     ...
 }

Winning rewards:

 Kiip.getInstance().unlockAchievement("_achievement_id_", null);
 Kiip.getInstance().saveLeaderboard("_leaderboard_id_", _score_, null);

Author:
Grantland Chew

Parameters:

setUserInfo

public void setUserInfo(Map<String,String> info)
Set the user's information to personalize their Kiip experience. examples: * alias - the user's player name for leaderbaords * email - the user's email address to pre-populate reward units If using OpenFeint, you can use their OpenFeint name: com.openfeint.api.resource.User#name for the user's alias

Parameters:
info - Map of the user's information.

unlockAchievement

public void unlockAchievement(String achievement_id,
                              Kiip.RequestListener<Resource> listener,
                              String... tags)
Unlock an Achievement. Rewards will be handled by Kiip.RequestListener if defined, else a notification will be shown.

Parameters:
achievement_id - Your achievement id
listener - Callback
tags - (optional) Dynamic type information about the achievement such as movies, sports, etc.
See Also:
Kiip.RequestListener

saveLeaderboard

public void saveLeaderboard(String leaderboard_id,
                            int score,
                            Kiip.RequestListener<Resource> listener,
                            String... tags)
Save a score to a leaderboard. Rewards will be handled by Kiip.RequestListener if defined, else a notification will be shown.

Parameters:
leaderboard_id - Your leaderboard id
score - The user's score
listener - Callback
tags - (optional) Dynamic type information about the achievement such as movies, sports, etc.
See Also:
Kiip.RequestListener

getActivePromos

public void getActivePromos(Kiip.RequestListener<List<Map<String,String>>> listener)
Get a list of live promos. If a promo is received, it will be handled by KiipDelegate

Parameters:
listener - Callback

isAuthenticated

public boolean isAuthenticated()
Method to tell if there is an active Kiip session

Returns:
true if Kiip was able to create a session
